message.name: ERR_FV_FREQUENCY_NOT_ENTERED
message.locale: Frequency must be entered.

message.name: ERR_CONTRACT_NOT_EDITED
message.locale: The contract is '%1c', it cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_CONTRACT_NOT_DELETED
message.locale: The contract is '%1c', it cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_FV_CONTRACT_AT_LEAST_ONE_OFFERING
message.locale: Service offering must be selected.

message.name: ERR_FV_CONTRACT_TOTALAMT_NOT_LESS_ZERO
message.locale: The Total Contract Amount must be greater than zero.

message.name: ERR_XFV_CONTRACT_TOTALAMT_REGULARAMT_NOT_ENTERED
message.locale: The Total Contract Amount or Regular Payment Amount must be entered.

message.name: ERR_XFV_CONTRACT_TOTALAMT_REGULARAMT_BOTH_ENTERED
message.locale: Only one of either Total Contract Amount or Regular Payment Amount can be entered for the contract.

message.name: ERR_FV_CONTRACT_REGULARAMT_NOT_LESS_ZERO
message.locale: The Regular Payment Amount must be greater than zero.

message.name: ERR_FV_ONLY_ISSUED_CONTRACTS_CAN_BE_ACTIVATED
message.locale: Only 'issued' contracts can be activated.

message.name: ERR_FV_CONTRACT_NOT_ISSUED_CANNOT_ACTIVATE
message.locale: The contract is not 'Issued', it cannot be activated.

message.name: ERR_FV_CONTRACT_ALREADY_ACTIVATED
message.locale: The contract has already been activated.

message.name: ERR_FV_CONTRACT_CANCELED_CANNOT_ACTIVATE
message.locale: The contract has already been deleted, it cannot be activated.

message.name: ERR_FV_CONTRACT_TERMINATED_CANNOT_ACTIVATE
message.locale: The contract is 'Terminated', it cannot be activated.

message.name: ERR_FV_CONTRACT_TERMINATED_CANNOT_MODIFY
message.locale: The contract is 'Terminated', it cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_FV_CONTRACT_DELETED_CANNOT_TERMINATE
message.locale: The contract has already been deleted, it cannot be terminated.

message.name: ERR_FV_CONTRACT_ALREADY_TERMINATED
message.locale: This contract has already been terminated.

message.name: ERR_FV_CONTRACT_NOT_LIVE_CANNOT_TERMINATED
message.locale: The contract is not 'Live', it cannot be terminated.

message.name: ERR_XRV_CONTRACT_NAME_NOT_UNIQUE
message.locale: A contract with this name, %1s, already exists.

message.name: ERR_FV_CONTRACT_ALREADY_GENERATED
message.locale: This contract has already been generated.

message.name: ERR_FV_CONTRACT_TERMINATED_CANNOT_GENERATE
message.locale: The contract is 'Terminated', it cannot be generated.

message.name: PROVIDER_CONTRACT_DELIVERY_PATTERN
message.locale: Provider Contract Delivery Pattern

message.name: ERR_FV_CONTRACT_ACTIVATED_CANNOT_GENERATE
message.locale: The contract is activated, it cannot be generated.

message.name: ERR_XRV_CONTRACT_ACTIVATION_CANNOT_COMPLETE_SUCCESSFULLY
message.locale: It was not possible to complete the action successfully.
